markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/quest/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Mad Morena, the Príncipi captain who runs the Undercroft in the Gullet, has a buyer seeking crude luminous adra at black market rates, but she has no stock to sell. The Watcher needs to obtain some crates for her if I want to earn her favor. ## Walkthrough This quest can be easy or hard, depending on how rich you are. To skip it, you'll need to have {{cp2|30,000}} in your pocket, otherwise you'll have to find the [crates](/crateOfCrudeLuminousAdra/). * Start the quest by either talking to [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/) or [Captain Mad Morena](/captainMadMorena/). * You receive a [Wine and Gunpowder-Scented Letter](/wineAndGunpowderScentedLetter/) from [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/), inviting you to a parley at [Fort Deadlight](/fortDeadlight/). The letter arrives when you: ** Received the quest [Symbols of Death](/symbolsOfDeath/) and left [Dunnage](/dunnage/). ** Or completed the quest [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/), waited to receive the [Letter of Fine Penmanship](/letterOfFinePenmanship/) from [Captain Furrante](/captainFurrante/) when returning to the world map about 2 days later, then similarly waited for another day. * Talk to Aeldys at Fort Deadlight, she will then send you to Mad Morena. * According to Morena, the Vailian Trading Company has a stockpile of crude luminous adra at their mill in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), or you can ambush the Company's boats at sea as they ship the adra out of Neketaka. * The amount of crates you need depends on Morena's mood: ** Three crates for being sent by Aeldys. ** Four crates normally. ** Six crates for annoying her. * At the [Luminous Adra Mill](/luminousAdraMill/), you can either buy the crates directly from [Cortina](/cortina/), or steal them from a number of containers scattered throughout the mill. Stealing the crates requires a bit of luck, and will be easier using a character with higher [Stealth](/stealth/). * Alternatively you can pirate the crates from the [VTC](/vtc/) ships leaving [Neketaka](/neketaka/). 2 crates are guaranteed to drop from all VTC ships while the quest is active. * If stealing isn't your thing, Cortina will be willing to sell you the adra at a varying price if you can convince her. You will need to buy the full number of required crates, even if you have already obtained some by other means. **{{cp2|2000}} per crate - At least 3 Reputation with the Vailian Trading Company, asking for the company to return the favour. ** {{cp2|1500}} per crate - At least 3 Reputation with the Vailian Trading Company, and [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 6. ** {{cp2|1500}} per crate - [Bluff](/bluff/) 9, convince her that the purchase may be the first of many. * Return to the Captain and hand them in. ## Notes * If you are sent by [Aeldys](/captainAeldys/) you can get the sabre [Tarn's Respite](/tarnsRespite/) three times. This is one of the best early [sabres](/sabresDeadfire/) you can find, and is equal to the [Superb Sabre](/superbSabreDeadfire/) in [Penetration](/penetration/). ** While the Goods and Services quest is active, take the first bounty from [Barati](/barati/), a low-level VTC ship, and sink one more VTC ship. You will get two crates of luminous adra from each. Take these to Morena for your first sabre. ** The Luminous Adra Mill has six more crates, but steal just three at a time, making two more trips to Morena to get two more sabres. ** Each time you bring luminous adra to Morena and say, "I've got the luminous adra," you get the same dialogue and a sabre. Although the reward each time includes Major Positive: Principi sen Patrena and Moderate Positive: Delver's Row Criminals, the second and third rewards don't seem to add anything to your reputation. Experience points are only given for the first delivery. ** If you were not given the quest by Aeldys you can only get two sabres at four crates each. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/06_Neketaka_Slums_District/06_QST_LuminousAdra_Hunt.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Goods and Services''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Mad Morena, the Príncipi captain who runs the Undercroft in the Gullet, wishes to sell crude luminous adra at black market rates.
